me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.kinematics

Class SwerveDriveKinematics

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.kinematics.SwerveDriveKinematics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Kinematics<SwerveState>

    public class SwerveDriveKinematics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Kinematics<SwerveState>
    Kinematics for a swerve drive. This is stolen pretty shamelessly (and poorly adapted) from wpilib.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        public SwerveState calculate(Translation translation,
                             PointXY centerOfRotation)
        Calculate a SwerveState, given a translation and a center of rotation.
        Parameters:
        translation - the translation to calculate a swerve state based on.
        centerOfRotation - the center of rotation. To be entirely honest, I have absolutely no idea what this means.
        Returns:
        create a new swerve drive.
